## Excercise 4- 1,2

```{r, echo = FALSE}
dat <- read.csv('mtmv_data_10_12.csv', sep = ',')
attach(dat)
dat.fit <- lm(vote_share~mshare, data = dat)
summary(dat.fit)
```


```{r, echo= FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = dat, aes(x=mshare, y=vote_share)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = 'lm', col = 'red')
```
